briefTitle: Revaccination With PNEUMOVAX(TM) 23 in Older Adults (V110-007)
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label Study of the Safety, Tolerability, and Immunogenicity of Revaccination With PNEUMOVAX(TM) 23 Vaccine (Pneumococcal Vaccine Polyvalent, Merck & Co., Inc.) in Older Adults
summary: The purpose of this study is to determine that revaccination of Pneumococcal Vaccine is well tolerated and produces an immune response in older adults.

primaryOutcome.measure: Geometric Mean Concentration for Prevaccination (Day 1) to Postvaccination (Day 30) During the Extension Phase Subjects Completing the Extension for Serotype 3
